data.message: Somewhere in 2004 I had a red t shirt with ur pictures in both sides. I hate red clr, Sad looking guy in both sides, tatoos,you were not famous in Sri Lanka, never heard u b4 and i cant remember the reason why i bought that t shirt. Perhaps my senses told me to buy that t shirt cause the bond that im gonna make you with ur music. Still remember and love for forever.

replies.message: Wow the same experience i bought a t shirt whith em's face in the front of the shirt but i didnt know who the guy is. The i search his name in internet and youtube then i heard his song and i got addicted to his raps. Now im a stan, ill never forget that day that day that i first meet em.
